title.rendered: ELLE DECOR magazine features new European Ledge stone profile

content.rendered: Each month elegant home decor inspiration and design ideas are provided by the experts at Elle Décor. In the April 2013 issue, Elle Décor editors chose Eldorado Stone’s new European Ledge as a must-have outdoor design element that’s high on style.

excerpt.rendered: Each month elegant home decor inspiration and design ideas are provided by the experts at Elle Décor. In the April 2013 issue, Elle Décor editors chose Eldorado Stone’s new European Ledge as a must-have outdoor design element that’s high on style.
